''' Ubuntu-eg Contacts, devided by location to help newcomers getting involved.'''
<<BR>>
'''This page contains Ubuntu Egypt team's Contacts. People appear on the following tables are expected to *Mentor* new team member(s) to:'''
1. Get properly introduced to Ubuntu (OS, Community) and to answer any questins.
2. Get familiar with Ubuntu Communication methods, Mailing list, irc, Ustream, Launchpad.
3. Get familiar with Reporting Bugs.
4. Promote Ubuntu in their area.
